# Telemarketing Dashboard ðŸ“Š

A Streamlit dashboard for analyzing transaction data to identify P2P conversion opportunities and track telemarketing campaign effectiveness.

## Features

- **Targeted Customer Identification**:
  - Identify international remittance customers not using P2P
  - Find domestic customers using other services but not P2P
- **Interactive Visualizations**: Charts and graphs for data insights
- **Export Functionality**: Download reports as CSV or Excel
- **Daily Impact Tracking**: Template for tracking telemarketing results
- **User-Friendly Interface**: Intuitive web interface with file upload

## Installation

1. Clone the repository:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/telemarketing-dashboard.git
cd telemarketing-dashboard
